mapper.select:
SELECT a.* FROM sys_menu a
AND a.menu_id IN ( SELECT menu_id FROM sys_role_menu WHERE role_id IN ( SELECT ta.role_id FROM sys_user_role ta LEFT JOIN sys_role tb ON ta.role_id = tb.role_id WHERE ta.user_id = #{userId} AND tb.deleted = 0 ) )
AND a.menu_type = #{menuType}
AND a.deleted = 0
ORDER BY a.sort_number
